story_teamgalactic_01_11000/2401_1201_01:
This is going off without a hitch. I guess Dawn and
the others are luring the enemy their way?
story_teamgalactic_01_11000/2401_1201_02: Hold it right there, Champion Cynthia.
story_teamgalactic_01_11000/2401_1201_03:
We commanders will take you on full-force!
You won’t be going anywhere.
story_teamgalactic_01_11000/2401_1201_04:
Oh, perfect timing. I wanted to have a little talk
with you.
story_teamgalactic_01_11000/2401_1201_05:
Hmph! We don’t have anything to discuss with the
likes of you!
story_teamgalactic_01_11000/2401_1201_06:
Is that so? Then I suppose I’ll have my skill in
battle speak for me.
story_teamgalactic_01_11000/2401_1201_07: Ugh. This Champion is more trouble than I thought.
story_teamgalactic_01_11000/2401_1201_08:
Do you really understand what Cyrus is trying
to do?
story_teamgalactic_01_11000/2401_1201_10:
He’s seeking more power to create a
brand-new universe!
story_teamgalactic_01_11000/2401_1201_11:
And what happens after that? Has Cyrus told you
what he really intends to do? Even a little bit?
story_teamgalactic_01_11000/2401_1201_12:
Oh, shush! As long as it’s what Master Cyrus
wants, we’re with him every step of the way!
story_teamgalactic_01_11000/2401_1201_13:
Are you sure you don’t want to know what kind
of person he is, and what he’s thinking?
story_teamgalactic_01_11000/2401_1201_14: What kind of person he is?
story_teamgalactic_01_11000/2401_1201_15:
It wouldn’t hurt to see what he’s truly trying to
accomplish, right?
story_teamgalactic_01_11000/2401_1201_16:
It’s not like checking that first would cause any
delay in your plans.
